sections.heading: company; limitation of liability
sections.text: The liability of a member of a mutual company shall be limited to the premiums stated in the policy.SourceLaws 1913, c. 154, § 79, p. 428;R.S.1913, § 3216;Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. V, § 2, p. 608;C.S.1922, § 7815;Laws 1925, c. 124, § 2, p. 328;C.S.1929, § 44-40
